The smile gave away that the what was one of happiness?

C. cry - This is usually associated with sadness, not happiness.
D. frown - This is a facial expression of sadness or disapproval, not happiness.
E. make others happy too - This option fits best because a smile is often a sign that one is happy and can make others happy as well.
